trans-unit.source: Connect Your Data with Flow| Microsoft Docs

seg-source.mrk: Connect Your Data with Flow| Microsoft Docs

target.mrk: Propojte svá data pomocí Flow | Microsoft Docs

trans-unit.source: You can make your Financials data available as a data source and specify an OData URL of your web services to build an automated workflow.

seg-source.mrk: You can make your Financials data available as a data source and specify an OData URL of your web services to build an automated workflow.

target.mrk: Můžete dát své finanční údaje k dispozici jako zdroj dat a zadat OData URL svých webových služeb a vytvořit tak automatizovaný pracovní postup.

trans-unit.source: Using [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] in an Automated Workflow

seg-source.mrk: Using [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] in an Automated Workflow

target.mrk: Používání [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] v automatizovaném pracovním postupu.

trans-unit.source: You can use your [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] data as part of a workflow in Microsoft Flow.

seg-source.mrk: You can use your [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] data as part of a workflow in Microsoft Flow.

target.mrk: Svá data [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] můžete použít jako součást pracovního postupu v aplikaci Microsoft Flow.

trans-unit.source: You must have a valid account with [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] and with Flow.

seg-source.mrk: You must have a valid account with [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] and with Flow.

target.mrk: Musíte mít platný účet v [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] a ve službě Flow.

trans-unit.source: To add [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] as a data source in Flow

seg-source.mrk: To add [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] as a data source in Flow

target.mrk: Chcete-li přidat [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] jako zdroj dat ve Flow

trans-unit.source: In your browser, navigate to [flow.microsoft.com](https://flow.microsoft.com/en-us/), and then sign in.

seg-source.mrk: In your browser, navigate to [flow.microsoft.com](https://flow.microsoft.com/en-us/), and then sign in.

target.mrk: V prohlížeči přejděte na web [flow.microsoft.com](https://flow.microsoft.com/en-us/) a přihlaste se.

trans-unit.source: Choose **My Flows** from the ribbon at the top of the page.

seg-source.mrk: Choose **My Flows** from the ribbon at the top of the page.

target.mrk: Z pásu karet v horní části stránky vyberte položku **Moje toky**.

trans-unit.source: In the **My Flows** window, choose the **Create from blank** option.

seg-source.mrk: In the **My Flows** window, choose the **Create from blank** option.

target.mrk: V okně **Moje toky** zvolte možnost **Vytvořit od začátku**.

trans-unit.source: From the list of available triggers, select one of the [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] triggers available:

seg-source.mrk: From the list of available triggers, select one of the [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] triggers available:

target.mrk: Ze seznamu dostupných triggerů vyberte jeden z dostupných triggerů [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)]:

trans-unit.source: *When a customer approval is requested*,

seg-source.mrk: *When a customer approval is requested*,

target.mrk: *Když je požadováno schválení zákazníka*,

trans-unit.source: *When a general journal batch approval is requested*,

seg-source.mrk: *When a general journal batch approval is requested*,

target.mrk: *Když je požadováno schválení List finančního deníku *,

trans-unit.source: *When a general journal line approval is requested*,

seg-source.mrk: *When a general journal line approval is requested*,

target.mrk: *Když je požadováno schválení řádku finančního deníku*,

trans-unit.source: *When an item approval is requested*,

seg-source.mrk: *When an item approval is requested*,

target.mrk: *Když je požadováno schvalování zboží *,

trans-unit.source: *When a purchase document approval is requested*,

seg-source.mrk: *When a purchase document approval is requested*,

target.mrk: *Když je požadováno schválení nákupního dokladu*,

trans-unit.source: *When a sales document approval is requested*, or

seg-source.mrk: *When a sales document approval is requested*, or

target.mrk: *Když je požadováno schválení prodejního dokladu *, nebo

trans-unit.source: *When a vendor aproval is requested*.

seg-source.mrk: *When a vendor aproval is requested*.

target.mrk: *Když je požadováno schválení dodavatele*.

trans-unit.source: Flow will prompt you to select a company within your [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] tenant.

seg-source.mrk: Flow will prompt you to select a company within your [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] tenant.

target.mrk: Flow vás vyzve k výběru společnosti ve vašem [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] klientovi,

trans-unit.source: Because each step in the Flow is independent of the next, you may be required to define the company multiple times when using a [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] template.

seg-source.mrk: Because each step in the Flow is independent of the next, you may be required to define the company multiple times when using a [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] template.

target.mrk: Protože každý krok v toku je nezávislý na dalším, budete pravděpodobně muset při použití šablony [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] definovat společnost vícekrát.

trans-unit.source: At this point, you have successfully connected to your Business Central data and are ready to begin building your flow.

seg-source.mrk: At this point, you have successfully connected to your Business Central data and are ready to begin building your flow.

target.mrk: V tomto okamžiku jste se úspěšně připojili k datům Business Central a jste připraveni začít budovat svůj tok.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Flow documentation](https://flow.microsoft.com/documentation/getting-started/).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see the [Flow documentation](https://flow.microsoft.com/documentation/getting-started/).

target.mrk: Pro více informací navštivte sekci [Dokumentace Flow](https://flow.microsoft.com/documentation/getting-started/).

trans-unit.source: For troubleshooting your Microsoft Flow, see [Troubleshooting Integration with Microsoft Flow](across-troubleshooting-how-use-financials-data-source-flow.md).

seg-source.mrk: For troubleshooting your Microsoft Flow, see [Troubleshooting Integration with Microsoft Flow](across-troubleshooting-how-use-financials-data-source-flow.md).

target.mrk: Pro poradce při potížích v Microsoft Flow navštivte sekci [Integrace poradce při potížích v Microsoft Flow](across-troubleshooting-how-use-financials-data-source-flow.md).
